posts.post_title: WTB or Trade for Low Grade T206 Hofers
posts.post_content:
Looking to add to my collection of t206 Hof beaters... 
Ideally looking for low grade Poor/Fair raw cards of cards that are graded poor/fair or "authentic". Please email me list along with aksing price...

Thanks, 
Dave
